jyVis
Class JyVisSettings

java.lang.Object
  jyVis.JyVisSettings

public class JyVisSettings
extends java.lang.Object

The class which houses global system settings. When instantiated, this class is a Bean which gets ant sets the global values.

Author:
Curran Kelleher

colorOfObjectsBehindSelections

The color that all objects will be drawn with on the buffer image which is drawn behind selections.

defaultBackgroundColor

public static java.awt.Color defaultBackgroundColor
The default background color

updateSelectionWhileDragging

public static boolean updateSelectionWhileDragging
When true, selections are updated (and all relevant panels are repainted) as the selection is being created. If false, the selection is only updated when the selection is finished.

multipleSelectionModifierKey

public static final int multipleSelectionModifierKey
The key which will enable making multiple selections.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

brushingSelectionModifierKey

public static final int brushingSelectionModifierKey
The key which will enable brushing of selections. (meaning that when you hold down this key, the mouse will move the whole selection polygon around instead of changing it's shape)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

drawQuadTreeModifierKey

public static final char drawQuadTreeModifierKey
The key which will turn on drawing of the quad tree.
